Gene.title: Gene
Gene.description: Represents a gene with its properties, space effects, health risks, and variants.

symbol.description: The symbol of the gene (e.g., BRCA1).

name.description: The full name of the gene (e.g., Breast cancer type 1 susceptibility protein).

sequence.description: The DNA sequence of the gene.

chromosome.description: The chromosome where the gene is located.

start.description: The start position of the gene on the chromosome.

end.description: The end position of the gene on the chromosome.

strand.description: The strand of the gene (+ or -).

biotype.description: The biotype of the gene (e.g., protein_coding).

health_risks.description: List of health risks associated with the gene.

space_effects.description: Space related effects of the gene.

variants.description: List of variants of the gene.

DnaAnalysis.title: DnaAnalysis
DnaAnalysis.description: Represents a DNA analysis performed on a sequence.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the analysis.

originalSequence.description: The original DNA sequence that was analyzed.

sequenceLength.description: The length of the DNA sequence.

gcContent.description: The GC content of the DNA sequence.

analysisDate.description: The date and time when the analysis was performed.

results.description: The analysis results, stored as JSON string.

spacePredictions.description: Predictions related to space effects, stored as JSON string.

title.description: The title of the space research study.

findings.description: The findings of the space research study.

genesInvolved.description: List of genes involved in the space research study.

implications.description: The implications of the space research study.

reference.description: The reference of the space research study.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

isOnline.description: Indicates if the user is currently online.

UserStats.title: User Stats
UserStats.description: Statistics and achievements for a user.

definition.description: Stores gene data. Readable by all authenticated users. Writable by admins only.
Stores DNA analysis data for each user. Users can only read/write their own analysis data.
Stores space research data. Readable by all authenticated users. Writable by admins only.
Stores user profile information. Users can read all profiles but only write to their own.
Stores user statistics. Only readable and writable by the owner.
